description:
Professional golfer Tiger Woods was injured badly in a car crash in Los Angeles, CA on February 23, 2021. Since then there has been much speculation on whether he will participate in major tournaments moving forward.

This market asks whether Tiger Woods will play in the 2022 US Masters Tournament - the 86th edition of the Masters Tournament and the first of the four major men's golf championships held in 2022. It is scheduled to be played from April 7–10, 2022 at the Augusta National Golf Club in Augusta, Georgia.

If Tiger Woods plays in the 2022 US Masters Tournament, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution sources will be official information from the Masters Tournament (e.g.https://www.masters.com/en_US/players/player_list.html, https://www.masters.com/en_US/players/player_8793.html?promo=bio_players) or the Augusta National Golf Club, however other credible reporting may be used.

If the 2022 Masters Tournament is cancelled altogether, this market will resolve 50-50.

markets.question: Will Tiger Woods play in the 2022 US Masters Tournament?

title: Will Tiger Woods play in the 2022 US Masters Tournament?
